summary: Timeline_21 follows a journey through PTSD treatment with increasing use of coping strategies.

posts.text: The new medication makes me feel numb. Nothing will ever get better I don't feel like myself anymore. I gave up trying Scheduled an appointment to discuss adjusting the dosage. wrote in my journal Keeping a mood journal to track changes. I'm building a support system
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm worthless and pathetic I feel like I'm ruining everything. I'm failing at everything We decided to try couples therapy. reached out for help Had our first session and it went better than expected. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I deserve to suffer I feel like I'm ruining everything. I haven't showered in a week We decided to try couples therapy. set healthy boundaries Had our first session and it went better than expected. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm a burden to everyone I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I don't care about anything anymore But I've been practicing the breathing exercises used my DBT skills and it's starting to help. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. I'm worthless and pathetic I pushed everyone away Went outside for 10 minutes. took my medication as prescribed Called a friend. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. Everyone would be better off without me I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I can't see a future for myself Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. did some self-care activities Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I'm disgusting Back to square one. I can't get out of bed anymore Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. reached out for help Reaching out for support instead of giving up. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I want to give up on everything I'm failing at everything Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. reached out to my therapist Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm not giving up
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. did some self-care activities I acknowledge my progress Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm disgusting But I worked through it using my tools. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: The new medication makes me feel numb. I'm worthless and pathetic I don't feel like myself anymore. I'm failing at everything Scheduled an appointment to discuss adjusting the dosage. reached out for help Keeping a mood journal to track changes. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
